definition: one who doesn't avenge an injustice is not a gentleman, one who doesn't redress a wrong is not a man (idiom)
pinyin: you3 chou2 bu4 bao4 fei1 jun1 zi3 , you3 yuan1 bu4 shen1 wang3 wei2 ren2
traditional: 有仇不報非君子，有冤不伸枉為人
word: 有仇不报非君子，有冤不伸枉为人

definition: to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
hatred/animosity/enmity/foe/enemy/to feel animosity toward (the wealthy, foreigners etc)
abbr. for 非洲[Fei1 zhou1], Africa
to not be/not/wrong/incorrect/non-/un-/in-/to reproach or blame/(colloquial) to insist on/simply must

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
variant of 為|为[wei4], because of/for/to
variant of 為|为[wei2]/as (i.e. in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do
as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)
